author: Sherif Fouad
text: “As far as I know, the medical staff in the club here is very good and has different methods regarding rehabilitation."

author: Sherif Fouad
text:
Rangnick on Pogba's qualification in Dubai:
“I don't want any player to go through the qualification period outside the country or anywhere else outside the club.”
 "In my previous clubs, we were keen that rehab takes place within the club.”

author: Sherif Fouad
text: After his anger at Pogba's rehabilitation in Dubai.... Ragnick confirms that he has given instructions to the medical staff to rehab any injured player inside the club from now on and not to rehabilitate any player outside the club. #ManUnited #MUFC https://t.co/dC6gaZ0WHQ
